I thought the new base was going to be built around the Ark.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> The new base is in Africa.
> 
> ::Prowl::
> 
> Prowl shakes his head. All the devices that they could possibly 
need were 
> destroyed in the last attack.
> 
> "No, there's nothing to bring. Everything's kinda destroyed," he 
says, "But 
> after you're done moving, you can help us fix this dump."
